attributes.title: terrible app
attributes.review: I got this app to stay updated on President Trump‚Äôs campaign and messages, but the app kept crashing! After download, I opened it and it allowed me in for only a few seconds before crashing. I was confused, restarted my phone, and waiting a few minutes before trying again. Same thing. I even redownloaded the app, I‚Äôm not one to give up, and IT STILL KEPT CRASHING!!! I am updated on my IOS, and my phones almost brand new!! No reason this should be happening! If you can‚Äôt make an app work, how do you expect to do another 4 years of presidency?

attributes.title: I‚Äôm scared
attributes.review: After about four months of waiting for what I thought would be my new favorite app, I was thoroughly disappointed with the result. When asked if I would like to receive notifications, I accepted because I wanted to be as up to date with what was going on in my favorite presidents campaign as possible.    Unfortunately, every time I received an alert and orange would appear somewhere in my house. Soon me and my family were drowning in oranges. For this reason I am leaving a one star review, but only because I couldn‚Äôt leave one that is lower.

attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: We are going to keep the TikTok app because there are too many reasons to not get rid of it. We have kept Facebook on the App Store even though it has had several serious privacy concerns over the years. Secondly TikTok‚Äôs CEO is an American and all of the U.S. app user‚Äôs information is stored on U.S. soil. Lastly TikTok has stated that they will not give away any information even if it is requested. The reason TikTok has been banned in other places is because of political battles such as borders. So there is no reason that a fun, enjoyable, friendly app should be removed from the App Store.

attributes.title: Hmmmm
attributes.review: The FitnessGram Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal bodeboop. A sing lap should be completed every time you hear this sound. ding Remember to run in a straight line and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark. Get ready!‚Ä¶ Start.
